page.title: 11FOCUS 230
page.content: COMMONLY CALLED HELP LINES!WHEN OPENED BUILDING IN A STATE OF DISREPAIR.LEIGH PARK IS 3RD LARGEST COUNCIL ESTATE IN WESTERN EUROPE.THE TITLE COMES FROM THE DAY WHEN NUMBERS WERE PUT IN A BAG AND THE NUMBER 230 DRAWN FROM IT.THE WORD FOCUS MEANS THEY FOCUS ON ALL PROBLEMS. WHEN MOVED TO PRESENT BUILDINGS IN DUNSBURY WAY BRAMDEAN DRIVE OPPOSITE USED TO BE A FIELD.LEADER OF THE GROUP IS BETTY BELL A SOCIAL WORKER.ALL STAFF LIVE IN COUNCIL HOUSES ON THE ESTATE.THE IDEA OF THE CENTRE IS TO SPARK OFF IDEAS SUCH AS THE BUILDING OF SWIMMING POOLS AND TO HELP PEOPLE WITH PERSONAL PROBLEMS.
